org.liris.ktbs.dao.rest
Interface KtbsResponse

All Known Implementing Classes:
KtbsResponseImpl
public interface KtbsResponse

The response object produced by a KTBS operation performed through the REST API.

Author:
Damien Cram

Method Summary
 String getBodyAsString()
          The body of the HTTP response as a Java string.

          Give the mime type of the content.

          A utility method that converts the HTTP response body, if any, sent by the KTBS server to a string.
 boolean hasSucceeded()
           
 

Method Detail

hasSucceeded

boolean hasSucceeded()
Returns:
true if the service method has been executed on the KTBS server with success

getServerMessage

String getServerMessage()
A utility method that converts the HTTP response body, if any, sent by the KTBS server to a string.

Returns:
the body as a string, or an empty string if there is no body or the response is an error.

getKtbsStatus

KtbsResponseStatus getKtbsStatus()
Returns:
the KTBS status of the response

getHTTPETag

String getHTTPETag()
Returns:
the ETag header of a GET response, null if none.

getMimeType

String getMimeType()
Give the mime type of the content.

Returns:
the mime type, null if none.

getHTTPLocation

String getHTTPLocation()
Returns:
the location header returned by the KTBS server to give the URI of the created resource, null if none.

getBodyAsString

String getBodyAsString()
The body of the HTTP response as a Java string.

The string is obtained from the stream returned by the method getContentStream() on the underlying HTTP entity.

Returns:
the body of the underlying HTTP response, as a string.

getHttpStatusCode

int getHttpStatusCode()
